title: Science Competency Enhancement Program Linking Academia and Industry

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Design optimized for smartphone-based mobile environments, emphasizing practical tasks linked to workplace scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can develop three or more specific strategies to apply scientific theories in workplace settings.
Learners can perform reflective journaling connecting learning content to their job roles at least twice weekly.
Learners can identify two or more barriers to the transfer of scientific knowledge through peer interaction and propose solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
